*{padding:0;margin:0;border:0}*,:after,:before{-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}:active,:focus,a:active,a:focus{outline:none}aside,footer,header,nav{display:block}body,html{height:100%;width:100%;font-size:100%;line-height:1;font-size:14px;-ms-text-size-adjust:100%;-moz-text-size-adjust:100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust:100%}button,input,textarea{font-family:inherit}input::-ms-clear{display:none}button{cursor:pointer}button::-moz-focus-inner{padding:0;border:0}a,a:hover,a:visited{text-decoration:none}ul li{list-style:none}img{vertical-align:top}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-size:inherit;font-weight:400}body{background:url(6471a2ff04b612ad28e923a4281c93e8.jpg) 0 0/cover fixed no-repeat;color:#000}body .body__container{margin:0 auto;width:90%}body header{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin:20px 0;align-items:center;font-size:3rem;padding:10px .btn-add{background-color:rgba(32,184,133,.781)}body .container .btn-deleteAll{background-color:rgba(12,166,238,.63)}body .container .todo-list{flex:1 1 auto}body .container
